title: U.S. Lifting Border Restrictions: Hereâ€™s What Travelers Need to Know
sub_head: Children under 18 are exempt from vaccination requirements, and unvaccinated travelers will face stricter testing protocols
body:
International travelers began traveling to the U.S. Monday after the country reopened its borders, with most arrivals being required to show proof of vaccination and a negative Covid-19 test.
Biden administration officials have released more information on pre-departure testing for both international and returning U.S. travelers, as well as exemptions for children under 18.
